title: WTB Lajoie Portrait w/ Back Stamp
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: WTB Lajoie Portrait w/ Back Stamp
posts.post_content:
N54 Community,

I'm looking to complete all three Lajoie variations with stamps on the reverse; I already own the "throwing" and "with bat" variations with stamps.

I know this is a long shot, but I'm looking for help finding a Nap portrait with a legible back stamp, i.e. star(s), a collector's name, a date, etc. Any leads would be much appreciated!

Eric
